title: The Sporty Trend - Spring Fashion 2014 | Lord & Taylor
description:
In the sporty trend this spring, the athletic-inspired movement sports electric pastels in spring's most coveted casuals. Try a sweatshirt with a skort. It's a look to obsess over.


Spring 2014 Fashion Trends:
The "It" List: http://youtu.be/yXHrLocxfMk
